thread.title: Shane Warne goes for a stroll in Melbourne in underpants
thread.title_full: Shane Warne goes for a stroll in Melbourne in underpants | Daily Mail Online

author: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
title: Shane Warne goes for a stroll in Melbourne in underpants
text:
Cricket legend Shane Warne gave his neighbours an eyeful last weekend when he stepped out of his Melbourne mansion in his his underpants.
The 47-year-old 'Spin King' looked in confident spirits as he enjoyed a casual Sunday stroll near his home in the well-heeled suburb of Brighton.
Shane, who has a reputation as a ladies' man, did not appear self-conscious as he walked barefoot in a pair of tight black boxer briefs.
Making a brief appearance! Cricket legend Shane Warne gave his neighbours an eyeful last weekend when he stepped out of his Melbourne mansion in his his underpants
The Advanced Hair Studio ambassador later spent the day playing cards at Melbourne's Crown Casino.
And during a game of poker, Shane was even spotted enjoying a shoulder and back massage by a female member of staff.
Meanwhile, Shane recently defended his 19-year-old daughter Brooke following magazine reports she was a 'wild' party girl.
Still bowling them over, Warnie! The 47-year-old 'Spin King' looked in confident spirits as he enjoyed a Sunday stroll near his home in the well-heeled suburb of Brighton
The retired Test cricketer told the Herald Sun last month that Woman's Day's claims Brooke has inherited his 'love of partying' were completely false.
'This was the last straw. This latest article they have published has no facts to it whatsoever and is total lies,' he said.
'As parents we felt the need to defend our daughter's integrity as she's being portrayed in a light which is not right.'
Staying focused! The Advanced Hair Studio ambassador later spent the day playing poker at Melbourne's Crown Casino, where he also enjoyed a massage during a game
Shane's ex-wife Simone Callahan also stated it was unfair their children had been brought into the spotlight simply due to their father's notoriety.
'It's unfair that they are being harassed, judged and portrayed in a disrespectful way, along with false accusations and being totally misrepresented in the public space,' she said.
Simone also told KIIS FM the claims made about Brooke 'couldn't be further from the truth' and that she was upset and frustrated by the reports.
Hitting the right spots: As Shane concentrated on the poker game, he also received a massage
